name: Zero Divide: The Final Conflict
storyline:
The XTAL Corporation has taken control of the world's computer networks. Metal clashes with metal as through the use of a range of individually-styled fighting robots, you prepare to take on the might of XTAL and fight for the freedom of Earth.

10 characters, sporting all-new attacks moves and additional projectile attacks, battle it out in a variety of deadly arenas.
summary: Zero Divide: The Final Conflict is a 3D fighting game for the Sega Saturn. It was released exclusively in Japan.
